title: Suck On This Year: LYFAO @ 140 Characters or Less
description: One of America's most original and biting comic satirists, Denis Leary turns his irreverent eye and scathing humor on everything you love and cherish-and now he does it with a hilarious, illustrated collection of Tweets! Like a quiver full of arrows, Suck On This Year 's barbs will hit you where it hurts-and you'll love it.
author: Denis Leary
